Posts.Content: Thank you for replying Karen . Yes she did say go to the dentist for a check up. It was just so scary listening to all the side effects, as with all of us we go through so much , just when you think it’s ending you have to have more. But thank you so much Lisa xx
Posts.Title: Zoledronic acid

Posts.Content: Hi all I had an appointment with my oncologist today and have been told I need to have zoledronic acid drip every 6 months. I’ve been told all the sides effects and I’m a little worried as the Dr said my teeth could fall out ! And my bones could fracture. Has anyone else been told this? Or is anyone on zoledronic acid?  Help  Thanks  Lisa  X
Posts.Title: Zoledronic acid
